name: GetSitePagesList
description:
Retrieve a list of site pages with filtering options.

Use this tool to get a list of site pages, supporting both paging and filtering. Ideal for integrations that need to examine pages or use external services to suggest edits.

parameters.name: created_at_time_filter
parameters.description: Return Site Pages created at exactly the specified time. Accepts an exact timestamp in string format.

value_schema.description: Only return Site Pages created at exactly the specified time.

parameters.name: filter_created_after
parameters.description: Return Site Pages created after the specified time. Use an ISO 8601 timestamp format.

value_schema.description: Only return Site Pages created after the specified time.

parameters.name: created_before_date_time
parameters.description: Return Site Pages created before this date-time. Use ISO 8601 format.

value_schema.description: Only return Site Pages created before the specified time.

parameters.name: last_updated_exact_time
parameters.description: Return site pages last updated at exactly the specified time in ISO 8601 format.

value_schema.description: Only return Site Pages last updated at exactly the specified time.

parameters.name: filter_updated_after
parameters.description: Return site pages updated after this specific time. Use ISO 8601 format.

value_schema.description: Only return Site Pages last updated after the specified time.

parameters.name: last_updated_before
parameters.description: Return site pages last updated before this datetime. Format: ISO 8601 string.

value_schema.description: Only return Site Pages last updated before the specified time.

parameters.name: sort_fields_for_results
parameters.description: Specify fields for sorting site pages. Options: `name`, `createdAt`, `updatedAt`, `createdBy`, `updatedBy`. Default is `createdAt`.

value_schema.description: Specifies which fields to use for sorting results. Valid fields are `name`, `createdAt`, `updatedAt`, `createdBy`, `updatedBy`. `createdAt` will be used by default.

parameters.name: next_page_cursor
parameters.description: Cursor token for paged results; use `paging.next.after` for the next set.

value_schema.description: The cursor token value to get the next set of results. You can get this from the `paging.next.after` JSON property of a paged response containing more results.

parameters.name: maximum_results
parameters.description: The maximum number of site pages to return. Default is 100.

value_schema.description: The maximum number of results to return. Default is 100.

parameters.name: include_property_details
parameters.description: Specify the properties to include in the Site Pages results. Leave empty to include all properties.

parameters.name: include_deleted_site_pages
parameters.description: Set to true to include deleted Site Pages in the results. Defaults to false if not specified.

value_schema.description: Specifies whether to return deleted Site Pages. Defaults to `false`.

metadata.description: Tools that enable LLMs to interact directly with the hubspot_cms API.

parameters.name: createdAt
parameters.description: Only return Site Pages created at exactly the specified time.

value_schema.description: Only return Site Pages created at exactly the specified time.

parameters.name: createdAfter
parameters.description: Only return Site Pages created after the specified time.

value_schema.description: Only return Site Pages created after the specified time.

parameters.name: createdBefore
parameters.description: Only return Site Pages created before the specified time.

value_schema.description: Only return Site Pages created before the specified time.

parameters.name: updatedAt
parameters.description: Only return Site Pages last updated at exactly the specified time.

value_schema.description: Only return Site Pages last updated at exactly the specified time.

parameters.name: updatedAfter
parameters.description: Only return Site Pages last updated after the specified time.

value_schema.description: Only return Site Pages last updated after the specified time.

parameters.name: updatedBefore
parameters.description: Only return Site Pages last updated before the specified time.

value_schema.description: Only return Site Pages last updated before the specified time.

parameters.name: sort
parameters.description: Specifies which fields to use for sorting results. Valid fields are `name`, `createdAt`, `updatedAt`, `createdBy`, `updatedBy`. `createdAt` will be used by default.

value_schema.description: Specifies which fields to use for sorting results. Valid fields are `name`, `createdAt`, `updatedAt`, `createdBy`, `updatedBy`. `createdAt` will be used by default.

parameters.name: after
parameters.description: The cursor token value to get the next set of results. You can get this from the `paging.next.after` JSON property of a paged response containing more results.

value_schema.description: The cursor token value to get the next set of results. You can get this from the `paging.next.after` JSON property of a paged response containing more results.

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: The maximum number of results to return. Default is 100.

value_schema.description: The maximum number of results to return. Default is 100.

parameters.name: archived
parameters.description: Specifies whether to return deleted Site Pages. Defaults to `false`.

value_schema.description: Specifies whether to return deleted Site Pages. Defaults to `false`.

secrets.description: The OAuth token to use for authentication.
